FuncDef: This command specifies a log ID destination. This parameter is mandatory when configuring a log destination. This command instructs the events selected for the log ID to be directed to the current console or telnet session. This command is only valid for the duration of the session. When the session is terminated the "to session" configuration is removed. A log ID with asessiondestination is saved in the configuration file but the "to session" part is not stored.
